barrel_awm_ai_custom_435mm.Name: Custom 435mm .338 LM barrel for Arctic Warfare Magnum

barrel_awm_ai_std_686mm.Name: 686mm .338 LM barrel for Arctic Warfare Magnum

magazine_awm_ai_86x70_5.Name: 5-round .338 LM magazine for AWM
magazine_awm_ai_86x70_5.Description: Single-stack 5-round magazine for Arctic Warfare Magnum.

mount_awm_ai_top_picatinny_rail.Name: AI Picatinny multi-slot base for Arctic Warfare Magnum
mount_awm_ai_top_picatinny_rail.Description: Accuracy International scope mount is a universal mount for Arctic Warfare rifles.

muzzle_awm_ai_mb_86x70.Name: AI AWM muzzle brake for Arctic Warfare Magnum
muzzle_awm_ai_mb_86x70.Description: Standard muzzle brake for Arctic Warfare Magnum, designed to greatly reduce jump, flash and felt recoil, as well as serve as a base for optional iron sights and suppressors.

stock_awm_ai_at_style.Name: AI AT-style stock for Arctic Warfare Magnum
stock_awm_ai_at_style.Description: Custom-made stock, design of which is heavily inspired by stocks used on Accuracy International AT-series rifles.

stock_awm_ai_awm.Name: AI AWM stock for Arctic Warfare Magnum

stock_awm_ai_awmf.Name: AI AWM-F stock for Arctic Warfare Magnum

weapon_ai_awm_338lm.Name: Accuracy International AWM .338 LM sniper rifle
weapon_ai_awm_338lm.Description: Renowned for its precision over the long distances, Arctic Warfare Magnum is the result of further development of Arctic Warfare rifle series, designed to chamber magnum rifle cartridges.
